## How Lindsey Vonn's Crash Threatens Her Olympic Comeback
US skier Lindsey Vonn was airlifted from the course after a terrifying crash, putting her Olympic comeback in jeopardy. The crash has raised concerns about Vonn's ability to recover in time for the upcoming Olympics.

## Lindsey Vonn's Career-Highs and Lows
Lindsey Vonn is one of the most successful skiers in US history, with a record 82 World Cup wins. She has won four World Cup overall championships and has competed in four Olympics, winning two medals. However, her career has been marked by injuries, including a knee injury that kept her out of the 2014 Sochi Olympics.
